card.title: IMS PRASAR
card.subtitle: Let us Do Incredible Things
card.content:
Audiences who connect with our brands on all our channels are highly engaged and eager to act. They actively seek inspiration and ideas from professionals and brands they admire. Make an effect in the world of distraction. With the attention economy contracting, building consumer trust is critical to breaking through the noise.

Our multidisciplinary Digital Ad Innovation team combines the art of storytelling with the science of smart audience targeting to offer meaningful engagement at scale in a trusted, brand-safe environment. We look forward to sharing that inspiration with you.

card.title: ABOUT US
card.subtitle: India celebrates Exploration
card.content:
Indian Media Syndicate strives to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world with scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.

This is an Indian family of informational, educational and entertainment-oriented Television, Applications and Websites offering value to how Education is developed and accessed by Indic Societies.

elements.title: INDIAN MEDIA SYNDICATE MEMBERSHIP
elements.subtitle: The Greatest Event in Indian Broadcasting

cards.title: IMS
cards.subtitle: PRASAR
cards.content: Precious Members of the Indian Media Syndicate

cards.title: PRASAR
cards.subtitle: MONETIZATION
cards.content: Guidelines for IMS production partners and terms of cooperation

card.title: OUR INVESTORS LIVE HERE
card.subtitle: We work for a Purpose. Find Yours.
card.content: Every year, a major portion of our net earnings is reserved to fund organisations/individuals that support science, exploration, conservation, and education. This one-of-a-kind collaboration fosters a virtuous loop of storytelling and inquiry that motivates individuals to act, broadens their perspectives, and frequently ignites new ideas and invention.

card.title: ABOUT US
card.subtitle: India celebrates Exploration
card.content:
Indian Media Syndicate strives to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world with scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.

This is an Indian family of informational, educational and entertainment-oriented Television, Applications and Websites offering value to how Education is developed and accessed by Indic Societies.

heading.title: OUR MISSION
heading.subtitle: To Revolutionize Indian Media
heading.content: By making every Information, every Discovery, every Invention, every Challenge accessible to every person in the India pacific Region

card.subtitle: Making Knowledge Accessible to All.
card.content: Each control has been designed for multiple use, several administrators will be able to assign content remotely from their mobile phones, without any worries.
